Html:
Hello,

I've been looking through the Theme resource reference page for a property to set the window title's color. The closest I came to was SubMenuText, which changes the color of the mui:Link. I need something to change mui:LinkGroup. I figured MenuText would work, but it did not. I exhausted all other "likely" properties too. Does anyone know the correct property for this?

Thanks in advance,
  • Jake M.
My bad... after some experimenting, it was MenuText. Not sure why it didn't work then, but it does now. Please disregard.
